fields.name: Active Skill: Nimbus
fields.value:
• Zues will summon multiple lightening strikes in a targeted area, stunning the enemy and dealing damages
• The damages can stack.
• Number of lightening strikes: 13
• Stun duration: 5 seconds
• Range: 13

fields.name: Passive Skill: Static Field
fields.value:
• Zues will increase the attack speed of allied units and reduce the enemy’s attack.
• Every 5 seconds, Zeus will summon one lightening strike to a random area, stunning the enemy and dealing damage.
• Stun duration: 5 seconds
• Range: 13

fields.name: Legendary Skill: The Wrath of God
fields.value:
• The lightening strikes of awakened Zeus will deal enemy units additional damage that is proportional to their maximum health.
• The additional damages can stack.
• Health Proportion: 2% / 4% / 6% / 8% / 10%
